title: Kimi Ga Tonari Ni Iru Yo Dake De ~Ai Subeki Doubutsu Tachi~
alternative_title: Kimi ga tonari ni iru dake de ~Ai subeki Doubutsu tachi~, Kimi ga Tonari ni Iru Dake de - Aisubeki Doubutsu-tachi, Borderline, Akatsuki no Stallion, Ashita no Nyaata, Hibi Kore Neko Jitsu, Bokura Shinbun, Sorekara, Neko ni Umare Kawatta Boku wa, Kyou wa Shuppatsu no Hi, 04992, Nyaata Tomorrow, Every Day is a Cat Day
status: Kimi ga tonari ni iru dake de ~Ai subeki Doubutsu tachi~, Kimi ga Tonari ni Iru Dake de - Aisubeki Doubutsu-tachi, Borderline, Akatsuki no Stallion, Ashita no Nyaata, Hibi Kore Neko Jitsu, Bokura Shinbun, Sorekara, Neko ni Umare Kawatta Boku wa, Kyou wa Shuppatsu no Hi, 04992, Nyaata Tomorrow, Every Day is a Cat Day
description:
Description :
        Anthology of stories by different shoujo/josei authors.

1) Borderline (NEMU Youko) **Also printed in Nemu Youko's Shounen Shoujo**
2) Akatsuki no Stallion (SHINOHARA Chie)
3) Ashita no Nyaata (NISHI Keiko)
4) Hibi Kore Neko Jitsu (HATSU Akiko)
5) Bokura Shinbun (OUSAKA Mieko)
6) Sorekara (Hozumi)
7) Neko ni Umare Kawatta Boku wa (SAKURAWA Asuka)
8) Kyou wa Shuppatsu no Hi (OOUCHI Eiko)
9) 04992 (Est Em)
